nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp20.maze.items

Interface Collectable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Item
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BugEntity, Key, Remedy, Treasure

    public interface Collectable
extends Item
    This interface defines the required properties for an object that can be collected. Moreover it adds a level of abstraction as any collectable object can be generally Described with this interface.
     

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods

      default boolean hasAction()
      Check if this item is linked with an action.
      default boolean isAccessible(Entity entity)
      Identify whether this item can allow the player to move into it.
      default boolean isCollectable()
      Check if this item can be added to the player inventory.
